A small, lively, and nautical-themed pasta restaurant where you can choose as many ingredients to go into your creation as you'd like. Apart from being a little crowded during their busy hours, their pastas are delicious and are served with a complimentary side of fresh bread if you request it.  I always order the tagliatella pasta with either pesto or red pesto sauce and have never been disappointed. With everyone creating something different, it's fun to go around and have a taste of the other dishes. I highly recommend this restaurant to fresh pasta lovers and those looking for a more creative dinner option.
